<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Librarian's Baton](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1466)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Detection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=43" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder Special: Fumbus](/Sources.aspx?ID=105) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A crystal pendulum hangs loosely from a delicate cord connecting the tips of this Y-shaped wooden baton. Such batons are often used by librarians who have problems with customers (or thieves) who can't be trusted to return the books they borrow, but they're equally valuable to wizards who are particularly worried about having ther spellbooks stolen. 

<document level="2" id="action-1106" /> 

<document level="2" id="action-1107" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
